description:
The mod_auth_openidc is an OpenID Connect authentication module for Apache HTTP Server. It enables an Apache HTTP Server to operate as an OpenID Connect Relying Party and/or OAuth 2.0 Resource Server. 

Security Fix(es):

* cjose: AES GCM decryption uses the Tag length from the actual Authentication Tag provided in the JWE (CVE-2023-37464)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
name: RLSA-2023:4418
topic:
An update is available for module.mod_auth_openidc, cjose, module.cjose, mod_auth_openidc.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
